task.title: Understanding Words in Context
task.shortdesc: Learn how to understand unfamiliar words using surrounding text and context clues.

taskbody.context: On most Hi-set tests, you'll encounter difficult vocabulary words. While studying vocabulary is helpful, you need strategies for understanding new words during the test.

step.cmd: Locate the unfamiliar word in its paragraph
step.info: Find where the word appears and note its position in the text.
Look at sentences before and after the word.

substep.cmd: Find examples that illustrate the word's meaning

step.cmd: Determine the word's meaning from context
step.stepxmp: In the sample text, "contentious" appears in discussion of conflicts and disagreements, suggesting it means "disputed" or "controversial"

taskbody.result: You should be able to understand unfamiliar words without a dictionary.
